import React, { Component } from 'react' import './AdicionarUsuario.css' const INITIAL_STATE = { usuario: { nome: '', sobrenome: '', email: '' } } function AdicionarUsuario(props) { this.state = INITIAL_STATE this.onChangeHandler = this.onChangeHandler.bind(this) this.onSubmitHandler = this.onSubmitHandler.bind(this) const onChangeHandler = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target this.setState({ usuario: { ...this.state.usuario, [name]: value } }) } const onSubmitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const usuario = this.state.usuario fetch('https://reqres.in/api/users', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(usuario) }) .then(resposta => resposta.json()) .then(dados => { this.setState(INITIAL_STATE) this.props.adicionarUsuario(dados) }) } return (

Adicionar Usu√°rio

) } export default AdicionarUsuario
